system.description: You are able to make Charizard-class Curries as a Camp Action. One of these Curries restores 50% of the party's max HP and have them recover from Exposure. On a 1-25, you attract a non-hostile Pokemon from the local environment to investigate the camp.

actions.name: Charizard-class Curry
actions.description: You are able to make Charizard-class Curries as a Camp Action. One of these Curries restores 50% of the party's max HP and have them recover from Exposure. On a 1-25, you attract a non-hostile Pokemon from the local environment to investigate the camp.
